website_summaries.verdict: A great smoker for beginners who do not want to make a large investment.
pros: Porcelain-coated charcoal pan, water bowl, and smoking racks
Can handle a wide variety of meats
Front door makes it easy to add charcoal
Built-in lid thermometer provides an accurate temperature reading
cons: Adjusting the temperature on this charcoal unit is a little more difficult than the electric or propane models

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker the the occasional enthusiast.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good enough little smoker for what I need it for. If you’re going into a Q competition, you might want a little better. But for occasianal smoking of brisket (need to cut it in half and use both grates), ribs, chicken, or pork but, you can’t beat this for $40 from Prime Warehouse. Easy to get to temp, imparts great flavor, small enough to store conveniently when I’m not using it. I did buy some heat proof moulding to seal the lid and fire hatch. Think that’ll give me better temp control and smoke penetration. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: With a couple of modifications worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: With a couple of modifications worked like a charm. I would suggest getting a charcoal grate to put in the charcoal pan and drill a hole for air.
customer_reviews.author: Veterans Flag Depot

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal gets smothered out .............
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine , but I think it needs a grate in the charcoal pan to keep the chips and charcoal out of the ashes ,so they don't get smothered out ..
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bollman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for those who want to smoke meat without ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for those who want to smoke meat without a huge smoker. My husband is obsessed with smoking meat now!!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great product low price
customer_reviews.text: I love this for smoking pork butts and sausage. It couldn't fit a brisket or a slab of baby back ribs but it's perfect for smoking pork butts chicken and sausage which is why I purchased it but I like it would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Harding

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did all I expected, but regret not choosing the electric model
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good size and well constructed. We use it twice a month and happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Durso

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: The description says: 395.4 sq. inches of cooking space. Really? Maybe someone needs to brush up on their arithmetic skills. The grill is 16 inches in diameter. The radius squared is 64, multiply by 3.14 and you get 201 square inches. I chose this grill based on the described generous cooking area which turns out not to be so generous after all. I am NOT PLEASED.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: This is poorly built and arrived warped. Bought it at Christmas and just now able to use it, because the weather warmed up. What a disappointment. I hope the seller or manufacturer will see this and offer assistance. Only used once and will probably never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a family of 4. Well packaged works great
customer_reviews.author: Peg and Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent first smoker
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He has wanted to start smoking meats for a while now. Excellent starter unit.
customer_reviews.author: mkseltzer

customer_reviews.title: Does good
customer_reviews.text: Had about three smokers. This one not much different racks hold quite a bit if meat. Does good job
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small smoker
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for father's day. It's small and wanted to get a cheaper smoker to start with and this is perfect!! You can smoke 3 racks of ribs and we cut a large briscuit into smaller pieces and smoke it at once. Great value and great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bergy

customer_reviews.title: The salmon we did on it was fantastic tho and was easy to use after the initial
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. Bought this for a friend and he wanted to ask customer service a question on it. Waited 30 minutes and gave up. The salmon we did on it was fantastic tho and was easy to use after the initial setup
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Good not great. This product is good for the first time user/ or occasional user. Water basin is hard to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Garry the Mc

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. Poor quality. Leaks heat everywhere. Couldn't get the temp up over 200 no matter how much charcoal I used.wish I could return it. Waste of whatever you spend on it
customer_reviews.author: Tcpas

customer_reviews.title: Easy starter or travel smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Great little smoker, just the right size for a family of four. Easy assembly, straight forward to use. A good first smoker for starting out, bit it still puts out a excellent turkey, pork loin, shoulder or brisket.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold heat
customer_reviews.text: Nice smoker, BUT.. will not hold heat. Starting with glowing orange charcoal briquets, smoker holds the heat for about 20 minutes, then decreases to nearly cold. the design does not allow sufficient combustion air to reach the charcoal. I 'll try some modifications. Would not recommend for any use where temp above 220F is required for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Wirtz

customer_reviews.title: Not healthy at all!
customer_reviews.text: I used it more than five times and all what I smoked had an awful taste of paint or something like that. Tried to use it as a BBQ grill and I got the same result, just gave to my neighbor for free.
customer_reviews.author: ms55

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: bit hard to get to the second rack, would have been better if handles are built in to lift the first rack easily. for the money, it is a decent smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality and makes a good smoked turkey
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and the parts look durable. I used it for the Thanksgiving turkey and everyone liked the result. I can recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: N1128Q

customer_reviews.title: ... basic smoker that with some modifications can do a nice job for a single guy like me
customer_reviews.text: Its a basic smoker that with some modifications can do a nice job for a single guy like me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Howell

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It has been so good to me with a new thermometer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small size but will cook two good sized pork butts.
customer_reviews.text: Not efficient with the charcoal but not difficult t keep steady smoking temp for pork butt.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Y

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!... Had used several other models similar to this one,.. but,.. the bullet far exceeded any of them!!... This is an awesome and amazing product!!..
customer_reviews.author: Ron Long

customer_reviews.title: I'm really enjoying this lil smoker.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job just fine for me. Great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money use it all the time I did drill holes in charcoal pan with air flow burns a little hotter
customer_reviews.author: Flocker411

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas for my husband. He loves it. For a beginner it's a good smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Eluned Jones

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smoker for my husband for his first father’s day. He used it once. The smoker worked great however, It is defective. The thermometer is not reading the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: shalene

customer_reviews.title: Love this smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker. Bought it to have in time to smoke a turkey breast for Christmas and it didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mills

customer_reviews.title: Power drill tightens better than arm muscle
customer_reviews.text: Got to the last step and can't figure out what holds the water bowl and bottom rack. 3 screws left and not a clue what to do with them. Hope I get it right before Memorial Day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter smoker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son in college and he loves it. Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as a thought good cold smoker had to mod it so it would work. You get what u pay for
customer_reviews.author: ironwolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect smoker for all levels of users. Simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Small & Short Smokes
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try my hand at smoking so decided on the MasterBuilt charcoal smoker. Wanted to try without breaking the bank in case it was too difficult. Turns out it's pretty easy! The MasterBuilt works good for smaller items with shorter smoking times. Difficult to maintain temps over 220 degrees for long periods. Adding briquets don't seem to keep up heat fast enough. I don't think it's possible to do brisket. Going to make some modifications based on what I've read on the internet. For starting out this is a good little unit but I after a few months I'm quickly growing out of it. I will still use it for quick smoking!
customer_reviews.author: A. Funamori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little smoker
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loves it. Easy assembly. Cooks well. Good addition to the summer parties.
customer_reviews.author: PJD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were able to smoke two small turkeys which save time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minimally acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Acceptable build quality. The one air vent on the smoker is ineffective for temperature regulation. Temperature regulation has to be done with the amount of coals you burn.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Not what it’s cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to cook on it now and it won’t hold the heat. We are on the third bag of charcoal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't warm to the temperature they said, in ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't warm to the temperature they said, in the area where the charcoals goes it needs more ventilations. A couple of holes may help. Other than that it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t get everything for assembly which is really frustrating ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get everything for assembly which is really frustrating. Especially when my fiancé was looking forward to this
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great for a first time smoker
customer_reviews.text: Nice smoker for our first one. Food came out great
customer_reviews.author: lovetocook

customer_reviews.title: it’s Easy to use and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, it’s Easy to use and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Steph berger

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift based on Consumer Report reviews. He loved it and said it works wonderfully. It is small in size and perfect for a bachelor or couple.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat for the price.. three smokes so far for 8 hrs and it did great..price was good but lowest had it a lily cheaper fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: food taste amazing..
customer_reviews.text: Omg.....the hubby loves this....food taste amazing ....thank u..only issue was the door wouldn't stay close so hubby welded it together
customer_reviews.author: 🥰😘Juicy*J😉😚

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 2 turkeys
customer_reviews.text: Could not cook two turkeys at same time. Not enough room!
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS
customer_reviews.text: This qas so much better than i thought it would be for being so inexpensive. Its also very decent sized. This works just as well as the one my dad paid 300 dollars for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: No mess at all when smoking meat!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for a men’s fishing trip. The guys got them put together easily and said they were great to cook in.
customer_reviews.author: Lina A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good smaller smoker that can do about 10 lbs of ribs at a time
customer_reviews.author: Dave Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Smoking Sharon
customer_reviews.text: I like the smoker and it has done its job on grilling and smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This little beauty is able to smoke well without the cost of the bigger grilles.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Schnelle

customer_reviews.title: Quilty
customer_reviews.text: my box had a small hole on the side but no damage too the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Heat issues
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping we wouldn’t have the issues several people spoke about. But it wouldn’t stay a consistent temp or read correctly even.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little smoker. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This little guy packs a punch. 4 cooks in and not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing is sweet. get you one and smoke some butts.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Whittle

customer_reviews.title: Overall good experience! Easy assembly too.
customer_reviews.text: Took this out of the box the day it arrived, took about 20 minutes to put it all together correctly, and immediately fired it up! I cooked a bone-in pork shoulder all day for about 8 hours. It tasted absolutely amazing. The only thing about this product is that I wish I would have gotten the electric version so that I didn't have to sit and tend to the coals and wood all day long. It does as advertised though! works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my father for xmas. It didnt ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father for xmas. It didnt come with any racks so he has to call and get them also, thethermometer always shows at 160 degrees. I will never purchse form company again.
customer_reviews.author: LATRESHA

customer_reviews.title: ... I wanted a cheap option to make sure I like smoking. Maybe not a good choice I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: First time smoker so I wanted a cheap option to make sure I like smoking. Maybe not a good choice I couldn't get this thing to get past 175 degrees no matter how much charcoal or wood I put in the thing. Will try again next weekend but this smoker doesn't seem like it's too great. Edit: after putting a grate and drilling some holes in the charcoal pan it heated up good and cook a nice juicy pork butt in about 8 hours. Still needed to babysit it and throw char coal in it but it at least got the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Harman

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully and I love it
customer_reviews.text: Used this to smoke meats for Thanksgiving. Works wonderfully and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. McRight

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Father's Day present for my dad. I wanted something big enough that he could cook for a small gathering, but small enough for just him and my mom to use since it's just the two of them now. My dad is a true lover of all things smoked but is new to actually doing it himself. This is a nice basic one to get started on without being too expensive and it seems of good enough quality to last him until he's ready for an upgrade. He seems really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: maryellen

customer_reviews.title: There's alot of work to do before you can even think of smoking.
customer_reviews.text: They don't bother to mention that you have to assemble every single screw, nut, washer and every single individual component from the legs to the top handle. It may deserve a 5 star but you omit details about assembly, cleaning, seasoning or pre-trial cooking unit prior to smoking you're lucky to get 3.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, we've had it in the pasted and it's just like its history, have only used once
customer_reviews.author: Regina 617

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: No bottom air holes in the bottom to adjust temperature. Could never get the temperature over 200 with charcoal. Was very difficult to add water to it. To low to the ground for the constance maintenance of smoking. If it was not used or I purchased it from my local big box I would be returning it. I also had to eat the cost of the cover
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice could use matches to hold lid down when moving it from place to place
customer_reviews.author: Accountant

customer_reviews.title: Keep your expectations low
customer_reviews.text: I should have spent more. Has an awkward design that makes it hard to tend to the charcoal. Hard to get very hot
customer_reviews.author: smerano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and is just right since I ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and is just right since I live alone. Have not put it to the test yet as I am trying to find recipes for the correct way to smoke meats, size, etc. Would have been helpful if it came with some sort of recipe book. Since it is all one piece, I am not sure how easy it will be to add water without taking off the lid and losing heat.
customer_reviews.author: cgmizzou

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this smoker for Thanksgiving and our turkey came out fantastic. Very flavorful, tender and juicy. We also used it for Christmas to make a hen and ham. Both were great! Can’t wait to try salmon on it next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt 20060416 Charcoal Bullet Smoker
product_meta.description: The Masterbuilt Charcoal Smoker is perfect for backyard grilling, tailgate parties or camping. Whether smoking foods for your family and friends at home or on-the-go, Masterbuilt makes smoking simple
feature_bullets: Front-access door makes adding charcoal easy
Built-in lid thermometer provides an accuratetemperature reading
Porcelain-coated charcoal pan and water bowl

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars181 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
